name: Adventure Game (Carl's Crusade)
description:
Join Carl the cat on his adventures. Will he fight fires or become a knight? Save the day, or be burnt away?

This small choose your own adventure game is meant to emulate some of the old-school aesthetics and feelings of old text based adventure games like Zork. It's got about twenty screens and can be be easily finished in less than ten minutes (even if you fail multiple times). Hopefully you enjoy it, it was a small passion project.
